newsitem.title: UK: British Airways awards big publishing deal.
newsitem.headline: British Airways awards big publishing deal.

text.p: British Airways Plc has awarded Premier Magazines Limited a three-year contract to publish its five in-flight magazines, the UK airline said on Monday.

British Airways said the contract was the largest ever awarded in the UK contract publishing industry, representing 11 percent of the market. But officials from both companies refused to put a specific price on the agreement.
The contract involves the publication of around six million magazines each year. The five publications are High Life, Business Life, Concorde Review, Network and Dream Journeys.
"Our aim is to convince passengers that they don't have to buy a glossy magazine from the news stand before they board," said Premier Magazines managing director Craig Waller.
